column1: Underwood is the only female country singer to spend that kind of time at the top of the charts.
The 113th Congress will have a record number of female senators: 20. Sixteen of them are Democrats; four are Republicans.
She is the first Asian American female senator!
The nation to have an all-female Congressional delegation.
Women in Sport took upon the task to explore how athletes would prefer to be shown in the media.
According to the study presented at NASSS, female athletes prefer to see themselves portrayed in an athletically competent pose.
Fox News host Brian Kilmeade today referred to his female coworkers as Victoria's Secret models who can also speak.
The other highlight of that year was watching the female gym teacher do her first ever pullup.
Then, there's the issue of the female audience. Let's face it.
Maybe the collectors at the Collection Agency Service that collect female personals work slower.
